description: Landed, but a long day awaits me. I see I'm not the only one who had some misfortune here. The shipwreck I just passed has been here for a very long time. Also, it looks like there is a fire over there, I hope I'm not alone here... or should I?

steps.title: There is a dense jungle a mile away from here. Let's have a look.
Let's have a look where this smoke comes from.
These mountains are surprisingly big for an island of this size. That's the best viewpoint on this island for sure.
I wonder if I could scrape anything for that ruin...
